alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 2:24AM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...SNOWY AND WINDY CONDITIONS TODAY... .Gusty winds and locally high snowfall rates will combine to produce difficult travel conditions tomorrow afternoon over portions of southwestern South Dakota, the Black Hills, and northeastern Wyoming. Falling and blowing snow will lead to reduced visibility and slippery road conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and the Black Hills of Wyoming and northwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
